verses.text: These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Agur \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jakeh|strong="H3348"\w*—\w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w declared|strong="H5002"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Ithiel: “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* am weary, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* worn out.\f + \fr 30:1 \ft Or declared to Ithiel: “I am weary, O God, but I can prevail. (revocalizations); Hebrew declared to Ithiel—to Ithiel and Ucal:\f*

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w the|strong="H3588"\w* most \w ignorant|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* men, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* lack \w the|strong="H3588"\w* understanding \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w learned|strong="H3925"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H2651"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w bound|strong="H6887"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w cloak|strong="H8071"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w established|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w Son|strong="H1121"\w*— \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*!

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* word \w of|strong="H3605"\w* God \w is|strong="H1931"\w* flawless; \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H1931"\w* \w Him|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3254"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w prove|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w liar|strong="H3576"\w*.

\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \w things|strong="H8147"\w* \w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w You|strong="H4480"\w*— do \w not|strong="H4191"\w* \w refuse|strong="H4513"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w before|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*:

\w Keep|strong="H7368"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H7723"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H7723"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w* \w nor|strong="H3899"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*; \w feed|strong="H2963"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w portion|strong="H2706"\w*.

\w Otherwise|strong="H6435"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* too much \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deny|strong="H3584"\w* \w You|strong="H6435"\w*, saying, ‘\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?’ \w Or|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H3423"\w* \w poor|strong="H3423"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*, profaning \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Do \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w slander|strong="H3960"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H7043"\w* master, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H7043"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* bear \w the|strong="H5650"\w* guilt.

There \w is|strong="H1755"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* those \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* fathers \w and|strong="H3808"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* mothers.

There \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* those \w who|strong="H2889"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w their|strong="H7364"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* unwashed \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H7364"\w* \w filth|strong="H6675"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*—\w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w haughty|strong="H7311"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* pretentious \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* glances—

there \w is|strong="H2719"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* whose \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* whose \w jaws|strong="H4973"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w knives|strong="H2719"\w*, devouring \w the|strong="H2719"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6041"\w* \w from|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H2719"\w* earth \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H2719"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w* \w from|strong="H2719"\w* \w among|strong="H2719"\w* men.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w leech|strong="H5936"\w* \w has|strong="H5936"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: \w Give|strong="H3051"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w Give|strong="H3051"\w*. There \w are|strong="H1323"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w things|strong="H7969"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1323"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* say, ‘\w Enough|strong="H7646"\w*!’:
Sheol, the barren womb, land never satisfied with water, and fire that never says, ‘Enough!’

\w As|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w mocks|strong="H3932"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* scorns \w obedience|strong="H3349"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mother, \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* pluck \w it|strong="H5869"\w* \w out|strong="H5365"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w vultures|strong="H5404"\w* devour \w it|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w There|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w things|strong="H6381"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*:
the way of an eagle in the sky, the way of a snake on a rock, the way of a ship at sea, and the way of a man with a maiden.

\w This|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* an \w adulteress|strong="H5003"\w*: \w She|strong="H3651"\w* eats \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w wipes|strong="H4229"\w* \w her|strong="H1870"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w says|strong="H6310"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6466"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w wrong|strong="H6466"\w*.’

\w Under|strong="H8478"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w things|strong="H7969"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* earth \w trembles|strong="H7264"\w*, \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w four|strong="H7969"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*:
a servant who becomes king, a fool who is filled with food,
an unloved woman who marries, and a maidservant who supplants her mistress.

Four \w things|strong="H6996"\w* on earth \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w*, yet \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H2449"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*:
The ants are creatures of little strength, yet they store up their food in the summer;
the rock badgers \f + \fr 30:26 \ft Or the coneys or the hyraxes\f* are creatures of little power, yet they make their homes in the rocks;
the locusts have no king, yet they all advance in formation;
and the lizard can be caught in one’s hands, yet it is found in the palaces of kings.

\w There|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w things|strong="H7969"\w* \w that|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w stately|strong="H3190"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w stride|strong="H6806"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w four|strong="H7969"\w* \w that|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* impressive \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*:
a lion, mighty among beasts, refusing to retreat before anything;
a strutting rooster; a he-goat; and a king with his army around him.\f + \fr 30:31 \ft Or a king against whom there is no rising up\f*

If \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w foolishly|strong="H5034"\w* \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5375"\w* \w or|strong="H6310"\w* if \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w plotted|strong="H2161"\w* \w evil|strong="H2161"\w*, \w put|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w churning|strong="H4330"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* yields \w butter|strong="H2529"\w*, \w and|strong="H2461"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* twisting \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nose draws \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* stirring \w of|strong="H1818"\w* anger \w brings|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*.”
